scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:seed:all && NODE_ENV=test jest --forceExit
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:seed:all && NODE_ENV=test jest --coverage --forceExit
scripts.start: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && node server.js
